title: Faith in Action
summary: Summary for Hebrews 11. This chapter highlights Jesus’ superiority, the new covenant, and the call to persevere in faith.

faq.question: What is a key message in Hebrews 11?
faq.answer: Jesus is the ultimate revelation of God, greater than all previous mediators and sacrifices.

faq.question: What does Hebrews 11 teach about faith and endurance?
faq.answer: It calls believers to hold fast, trust in Christ’s finished work, and grow in maturity.
